about_the_game:
Petit Royaume

Step into a world where creativity knows no bounds. Petit Royaume is a relaxing, free-building game set in a beautifully pixelated 3D environment. With its unique blend of detailed pixel art and immersive, atmospheric effects, this game invites you to craft your own miniature kingdom tile by tile.


  • Relaxing Freebuilding Gameplay: Enjoy the freedom to build and shape your world without restrictions. Whether you're constructing bustling medieval cities or serene natural landscapes, the choice is yours.

  • Stunning Pixel-Art Details: Dive into a visually enchanting world where every pixel matters. Despite the pixelated design, Petit Royaume boasts intricate details, from gentle animations and effects like wind-blown leaves and smoke, to a rich variety of objects and tiles.

  • Diverse Tiles and Biomes: Explore and create with a wide array of tiles, including flowing rivers, vast oceans and different biomes. Each biome offers unique elements to enhance your world.

  • Rich Variety of Objects: Populate your kingdom with an array of medieval buildings, nature-related elements, and numerous small objects that add depth and charm to your creations. The game includes over 100 unique objects you can place in you world. If that isn't enough, the additional 300 variants can for sure help you further expand your endless world.

  • Relaxing and Meditative Gameplay: No stress, no time limits. Simply build, explore, and enjoy the soothing experience of bringing your pixelated world to life.



Whether you're in the mood to create a cozy village or a grand empire, Petit Royaume offers a tranquil escape into a world of your own making.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950 or higher
  • Storage: 190 MB available space
  • Sound Card: You don't need one, you've got subtitles.
